PassiveDesc.Name: ประกายแสง
PassiveDesc.Desc: เมื่อเริ่มต้นในแต่ละฉาก สลาย Page ทั้งหมดในมือและในกอง เพิ่ม Page ชุดดังกล่าวกลับเข้ามาใหม่ และมีคอส 0

PassiveDesc.Name: ดาบอันเผาไหม้
PassiveDesc.Desc: While Overheated: inflict 1 Burn to target on hit, and inflict 1 Burn to attacker when hit.

PassiveDesc.Name: ดาบอันเผาไหม้
PassiveDesc.Desc: While Overheated: inflict 1 Burn to target on hit, and inflict 1 Burn to attacker when hit.

PassiveDesc.Name: เพลิงเอ๋ยจงลุกโชน
PassiveDesc.Desc: Inflict 1 Burn to target on hit, and inflict 1 Burn to attacker when hit.

PassiveDesc.Name: หัวใจที่เยือกเย็น
PassiveDesc.Desc: ไม่รับดาเมจจากเผาไหม้

PassiveDesc.Name: ดาบแห่งอัคคี
PassiveDesc.Desc: When inflicting Burn using Combat Pages, apply +1 additional stack.

PassiveDesc.Name: อารมณ์ระอุเดือด
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever the Emotion Level rises, inflict 3 Burn to all characters, including self. Gain Power by half the current Emotion Level (Rounded down)

PassiveDesc.Name: ร้อนระอุ
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 15 or more Burn at the start of the Scene, become Overheated, dealing more damage with attacks but becoming more vulnerable to Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: หัวใจที่แตกระแหง
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 60% of Max HP. When Staggered, proceeds to the next phase, change resistances, and purge all status ailments from self.

PassiveDesc.Name: จิตที่สลายสิ้น
PassiveDesc.Desc: When an Unspeaking Child is defeated, lose Power by the number of Unspeaking Children that have been put down so far next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: หัวใจจักลุกเป็นไฟ
PassiveDesc.Desc: HP does not go below 30% of Max HP. When Staggered, proceeds to the next phase, change resistances, and purge all status ailments from self.

PassiveDesc.Name: หัวใจเป็นเชื้อเพลิง
PassiveDesc.Desc: Takes half as much damage from Burn. Starting with the Scene after it was spawned, gain 1 Strength and Endurance every Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: ร้อนระอุ
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 15 or more Burn at the start of the Scene, become Overheated, dealing more damage with attacks but becoming more vulnerable to Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: ไหม้สลาย
PassiveDesc.Desc: While Overheated: gain 3 Fragile each scene, and inflict 1 Burn to target on hit. Also, uses a different set of Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: เพลิงที่ถูกส่งไป
PassiveDesc.Desc: While alive, the first Offensive die allies play each engagement inflicts 1 Burn on hit. After death, allies are inflicted with 1 Burn when hit.

PassiveDesc.Name: ร้อนทะลุขีด
PassiveDesc.Desc: If the character has 10 or more Burn at the start of the Scene, become Overheated, dealing more damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scorching Desperation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 3 Scenes: 'Scorching Desperation' is added to hand, which will be used the same Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Restraints
PassiveDesc.Desc: On hit against a target with 3 or more stacks of 'Restraint', Immobilize them for the next Scene.
